pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bi-Level Optimization of Metabolic Network Models // Initial metabolic networks often inaccurately predict in-silico growth or non-growth if compared to in-vivo data. This package refines metabolic network models by making networks changes (i.e., removing, adding, changing reversibility of reactions; adding and removing biomass metabolites) and simultaneously matching sets of experimental growth and non-growth data (e.g., KO- mutants, mutants grown under different media conditions,...)
